attributes.action: Allow every baby born to have an echocardiogram soon after birth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most babies appear healthy at birth yet soon after they get home things can change dramatically, the lucky ones are the ones who survive yet many babies still die unnecessarily. I want every baby to have an echocardiogram before they leave hospital as a routine exam to the save the lives of our babies.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Allow every baby born to have an echocardiogram soon after birth."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
